content.html: This man is utterly unprepared for the role he bought. He doesn’t understand - laws vary per country. - free speech applies to government not TOS. - trust and safety are essential to a free and open dialog We’re going to get to see what a tool he is, this is bad.
content.value:
This man is utterly unprepared for the role he bought. 

He doesn’t understand 
- laws vary per country. 
- free speech applies to government not TOS. 
- trust and safety are essential to a free and open dialog

We’re going to get to see what a tool he is, this is bad.
